question: Who speaks proper English?

question: Who is a lazy person?
passage: Everyone on the block was signed up to help with this year's community rummage sale. The first people to show up were an old-timer and a younger guy. Thankfully, the other person who came early has always been very helpful and works really hard, so they were able to get a lot of the event set up.
